original: Ito cīvaraṁ denti taṁ cīvaraṁ tattha paribhuñjantīti?
analyzed: itas cīvaram denti tam cīvaram tattha paribhuñjanti iti

original: ito piṇḍapātaṁ denti, ito senāsanaṁ denti, ito gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ denti, ito khādanīyaṁ denti, ito bhojanīyaṁ denti, ito pānīyaṁ denti;
analyzed: itas piṇḍapātam denti itas senāsanam denti itas gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāram denti itas khādanīyam denti itas bhojanīyam denti itas pānīyam denti

original: Añño aññassa kārako parakataṁ sukhadukkhaṁ añño karoti, añño paṭisaṁvedetīti?
analyzed: aññaḥ aññassa kārako parakatam sukha dukkham aññaḥ karoti aññaḥ paṭisavedeti iti

original: Nanu petā attano atthāya dānaṁ dentaṁ anumodenti, cittaṁ pasādenti, pītiṁ uppādenti, somanassaṁ paṭilabhantīti?
analyzed: nanu petāḥ attanaḥ atthāya dānam dentam anumodenti cittam pasādenti pītim uppādenti somanassam paṭilabhanti iti

original: Hañci petā attano atthāya dānaṁ dentaṁ anumodenti, cittaṁ pasādenti, pītiṁ uppādenti, somanassaṁ paṭilabhanti;
analyzed: hañci petāḥ attanaḥ atthāya dānam dentam anumodenti cittam pasādenti pītim uppādenti somanassam paṭilabhanti

original: Tena hi ito dinnena tattha yāpentīti.
analyzed: tena hi itas dinnena tattha yāpenti iti

original: “pañcimāni, bhikkhave, ṭhānāni sampassantā mātāpitaro puttaṁ icchanti kule jāyamānaṁ.
analyzed: pañca imāni bhikkhave ṭhānāni sampassantāḥ mātā pitaraḥ puttam icchanti kule jāyamāna

original: Bhaṭo vā no bharissati, kiccaṁ vā no karissati, kulavaṁso ciraṁ ṭhassati, dāyajjaṁ paṭipajjissati, atha vā pana petānaṁ kālaṅkatānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ anuppadassati—
analyzed: bhaṭaḥ vā naḥ bharissati kiccam vā no karissati kula vaso ciram ṭhassati dāyajjam paṭipajjissati atha vā pana petānam kālaṅkatānam dakkhiṇam anuppadassati

original: imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca ṭhānāni sampassantā mātāpitaro puttaṁ icchanti kule jāyamānanti.
analyzed: imāni kho bhikkhave pañca ṭhānāni sampassantāḥ mātā pitaraḥ puttam icchanti kule jāyamānanti

original: Tena hi ito dinnena tattha yāpentīti.
analyzed: tena hi itas dinnena tattha yāpenti iti
